verses.verse: It <S%G4851>is<s%> <S%G1211>doubtless<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4851>profitable<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G2744>boast.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3701>visions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4253><s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> years <S%G2094>ago<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know,<s%> or <S%G1535>whether<s%> out <S%G1622>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know;<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%>), such a <S%G5108>one<s%> caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G2193>into<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1622>outside<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know;<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%>),

<S%G3754>how<s%> he was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3857>Paradise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>unspeakable<s%> <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2980>utter.<s%>

On behalf <S%G5228>of<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> I will <S%G2744>boast,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> <S%G1683>my<s%> own behalf I <S%G2744>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2744>boast,<s%> <S%G1487>except<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I would <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2744>boast,<s%> I <S%G2071>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G878>foolish;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I will <S%G2046>speak<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G5339>refrain,<s%> so <S%G3361>that<s%> no <S%G5100>man<s%> may <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> than that <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G191%G99999>hears<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>By<s%> <S%G5236>reason<s%> of the exceeding <S%G5236>greatness<s%> of the <S%G602>revelations,<s%> that I should not be exalted <S%G5229>excessively,<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> a <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4566>Satan<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2852>torment<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I should <S%G3361>not<s%> be exalted <S%G5229>excessively.<s%>
<S%G5228>Concerning<s%> this <S%G5127>thing,<s%> I <S%G3870>begged<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>three<s%> times <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He has <S%G2046>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> is made <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>weakness.<s%>" Most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2744>I<s%> will <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>rest<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I take <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5196>injuries,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G318>necessities,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4730>distresses,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s sake. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> am <S%G1510>I<s%> <S%G1415>strong.<s%>

I have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G878>foolish<s%> <S%G2744>in<s%> <S%G2744>boasting.<s%> <S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G315>compelled<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> by <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> was I <S%G5302>inferior<s%> to the <S%G5228>very<s%> <S%G3029>best<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G3303>Truly<s%> the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of an <S%G652>apostle<s%> were <S%G2716>worked<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> there in <S%G3739>which<s%> you were made <S%G2274>inferior<s%> <S%G5228>to<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1577>assemblies,<s%> <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> it is <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3361>I<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2655>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to <S%G5216>you?<s%> <S%G5483>Forgive<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> this is the third <S%G5154>time<s%> I <S%G2192>am<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2655>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to <S%G5216>you;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> your <S%G5216>possessions,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to save <S%G2343>up<s%> for the <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> for the <S%G5043>children.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> be <S%G1550>spent<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5590><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1487>souls.<s%> If <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> more <S%G4056>abundantly,<s%> am I <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2276>less?<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> be <S%G1473>it<s%> <S%G2077>so,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2599>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> myself <S%G2599>burden<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G5225>But,<s%> being <S%G3835>crafty,<s%> I <S%G2983>caught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1388>deception.<s%>
<S%G3361>Did<s%> I take <S%G4122>advantage<s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G5209>you?<s%>

I <S%G5103>exhorted<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G4882>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4882>with<s%> <S%G3361>him.<s%> Did <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> take any <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of <S%G5209>you?<s%> <S%G3756>Didn't<s%> <S%G4043>we<s%> walk in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit?<s%> <S%G3756>Didn't<s%> we walk in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2487>steps?<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> do <S%G1380>you<s%> think <S%G3754>that<s%> we are excusing <S%G626>ourselves<s%> to <S%G5213>you?<s%> In the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> are <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I am <S%G5399>afraid<s%> <S%G3381>that<s%> by any <S%G2064>means,<s%> when I come, I <S%G2147>might<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3634>way<s%> I <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G2504>to,<s%> and that <S%G2504>I<s%> might be <S%G2147>found<s%> by <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3634>as<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>desire;<s%> that by any means there would be <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy,<s%> outbursts of <S%G2372>anger,<s%> <S%G2052>factions,<s%> <S%G2636>slander,<s%> <S%G5587>whisperings,<s%> <S%G5450>proud<s%> <S%G181>thoughts,<s%> riots;

<S%G3361>that<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> when I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I would <S%G3996>mourn<s%> for <S%G4183>many<s%> of those who <S%G3340>have<s%> sinned <S%G4258>before<s%> <S%G2532>now,<s%> and <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>lustfulness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4238>committed.<s%>
